Class Professor

java.lang.Object
  Player
      Professor

public class Professor
extends Player

The Professor class is a subclass of Player. This subclass is another player that travels throughout the game field, but of moving by the user's command, it will move in a random direction and face a random direction based on a dice roll.

Version:
12/8/14
Author:
Avraham Amon

Constructor Summary
Professor(Room initialRoom)
          Constructs all fields from Player class, creates a new Random object that will be used for the professor to move around, and has the professor point in a random direction;
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Will move the professsor into a random room, or not move at all, and point the professor in a random direction.
 java.lang.String toString()
          The message the player will see if he encounters the professor in the same room.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Will move the professsor into a random room, or not move at all, and point the professor in a random direction.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
The message the player will see if he encounters the professor in the same room. Will also show the direction the professor is facing.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
